h: Kolkata: Stolen bus rams car on VIP Road, 3 of family killed
sub_h: A stolen private bus that was being chased by cops and some bus owners crashed into a car waiting at the Lake Town traffic signal on VIP road, killing a 54-year-old businessman, his 23-year-old son and 73-year-old mother at 3am on Monday.

h: Nine injured in accidents
Dy CMOH nodal officer for Road accident data
Kol sees 33% drop in fatal accidents from Jan to June
sub_h: The roads of Kolkata have witnessed a 33% drop in fatal accidents in the first six months of this year as compared to the same period in 2022, according to the data released by Kolkata Traffic Police on Monday.

h: Surgery helps teen see weeks after he lost sight in ‘one in a million’ injury
sub_h: Ankaj Kumar, 18, had survived a Road accident last month but when he regained consciousness, he was distressed to find that he could not see. He had lost vision in both the eyes. Now, a month later, the teenager from Darbhanga has got his vision back after a complex surgery in a Kolkata hospital.

h: Three bike accidents every day this May on Kolkata’s roads
sub_h: There have been three bike accidents per day so far this month, which translates to 58% of total accidents that took place on city roads, data collated by Lalbazar has revealed.

h: Biker on way to Kol from Ranchi dies in highway accident
8 hurt in Elgin Road accident in Kolkata
sub_h: Eight people were injured — one of them seriously — after the car they were travelling in rammed into a tree on Elgin Road, Bhowanipore early on Friday.

h: Four killed as SUV hits bike, truck in Kolkata
sub_h: Four persons were killed in an accident on VIP Road in Kolkata when a compact SUV rammed into a truck after running over two bikers in the wee hours of Monday.

h: 16-year-old among 2 dead in Kolkata's Dufferin Road bus accident
sub_h: A 16-year-old and another unidentified person were killed and 17 others injured - one of them critically - after a minibus reportedly turned on its side and fell on a motorcycle coming from the opposite direction. The bus also hit two more bikes, said cops. The accident was reported around 4.38pm on Saturday on the busy Dufferin Road, opposite the Gandhi statue, barely meters from the Mayo Road crossing

h: Kolkata cops' helmet-seat belt drive to stop accidents
sub_h: The Kolkata Traffic Police is launching a special campaign on the correct usage of helmets and seat belts to prevent fatal accidents. The drive will begin on Monday (March 20), which is observed as the World Head Injury Awareness Day.

h: 4 dead as car with marriage party on board falls from bridge in West Bengal's Kalimpong
sub_h: Four people were killed and several others injured on Saturday after a speeding car with a marriage party on board fell from a bridge in West Bengal's Kalimpong district, police said.

h: 8 killed in separate Road accidents involving motorcycles on Dol Jatra in Howrah
74 of 185 accident victims in 2022 in Kolkata were pedestrians
sub_h: In Kolkata, the Lalbazar released a statistics that showed that 40% of Road accident victims in the city were pedestrians last year. The city had witnessed 185 deaths in 178 accidents of which 74 victims were pedestrians in 2021. 196 people had died in 185 accidents and 77 of these victims were pedestrians following the NCRB data last year. Pedestrians were at fault in most of the accidents that involved jaywalking while other reasons included speeding, reckless driving, overtaking, and drinkdriving. The data also revealed that bikers had met with fatal accidents across the city for not abiding by traffic rules when they did not spot cops on the roads. "Though Kolkata has emerged as the best performer among other metro cities in terms of accident control, the total number of fatal accidents is still higher here than 26 other smaller cities these accidents mostly saw pedestrians’ deaths that is why all big projects of traffic police planned in 2023 like installation of boom barriers and ground led lights and development of model crossings and refuge islands in the middle of big crossings focus on the safety of pedestrians." said a senior officer of Kolkata police. Cops have finalized 26 points across the city where boom barriers will come up while another 26 spots have been chosen for installing led

h: 7 injured in Canal South Road accident in Kolkata
sub_h: At least seven persons - three of them pedestrians - had a close shave in the Pagladanga area of Tangra on Monday. According to cops, a mini-truck allegedly speeding on the narrow Canal South Road hit an app cab, which then hit several pedestrians crossing the road.

h: 2 youths from south Kolkata dead after bike-truck collision
sub_h: Two men in their early 20s from south Kolkata died in a Road accident at Narendrapur early on Tuesday morning when their motorcycle had a head-on collision with a speeding truck coming from the opposite direction. The two were identified as Sourabh Mondal and Kushal Deb.

h: Kolkata: Youth dead, 2 hurt in bike crash
sub_h: A 22-year-old youth died while two others sustained serious injuries in an accident involving two motorbikes on Kolkata's VIP Road early on Saturday.

h: Woman killed in Road accident in Kolkata
sub_h: A middle-aged woman was run over by a sedan in Ballygunge area of south Kolkata on Sunday, a police officer said.

h: West Bengal: 4 killed in pickup van-rickshaw collision
sub_h: Four people were killed and five others injured as a pick-up van collided head-on with a motorised rickshaw in West Bengal's Malda district, police said on Thursday. The accident happened in Goalbari in Habibpur police station area around 9.30 pm on Wednesday, they said.

h: Kolkata: Biker dead, 4 hurt in 2 Road accidents
sub_h: A biker died and four others were seriously injured in two separate accidents reported since Thursday evening. In the Taratala Road accident, a biker lost his life and the pillion rider suffered serious injuries when they dashed into the rear part of a private bus after the latter suddenly stopped. The bike crashed into the bus, throwing the two occupants on the road.

h: Kolkata: Nine injured in two accidents
sub_h: Kolkata: Nine people were injured in two separate accidents on Saturday. Four persons received injuries when two buses collided at the APC Road-Rani Swarnamayee Road crossing. Five more, including two on a bike, were injured when it collided with an auto on SP Mukherjee Road. tnn

h: Kolkata: Biker dies in Road accident
sub_h: A biker wearing a inadequately fastened helmet was killed on Wednesday morning after his vehicle skidded on a Sector V road and his head hit the wheels of a bus ferrying students of an engineering college in New Town, Kolkata.

h: West Bengal: 18 dead, 6 injured in Road accident in Nadia
sub_h: 18 people were killed and 6 injured after a speeding hearse, carrying a dead person along with family members and kin for the last rites of the deceased, hit a stone laden truck in West Bengal's Nadia district late in wee hours of Sunday.

h: SDPO injured in Road accident
Kolkata: App cab driver returning from Eid celebrations killed in Road accident
sub_h: The driver was taken to a local hospital and from there to RG Kar Medical College and Hospital, 16 kms away, where he was declared dead on arrival.

h: Covid deaths, accident toll treated as post-poll murders: Bengal
Two killed as motorcycle rams into truck in West Bengal
sub_h: Two men on a motorcycle were killed after their two-wheeler rammed into a truck from behind in West Bengal's Alipurduar district early on Friday, police said.

h: 3 killed, 1 injured in E Burdwan Road accident
Cop killed, several injured after bus hits Fort William wall in Kolkata
sub_h: A police constable died and 13 others suffered injuries on Thursday when a bus carrying passengers hit the wall adjoining a gate of Fort William -- the Army's Eastern Command headquarters -- with its driver having lost control on the wheels, an officer said.

h: 14 killed, 18 injured as car runs into truck in West Bengal's Dhupguri
sub_h: Fourteen people, five of them children, were killed and 18 injured in a Road accident in Dhupguri around 9pm on Tuesday when a vehicle, in which they were travelling, collided head-on with a stone-laden 10-wheeler truck, causing the truck to overturn and dump its load on two other vehicles.

h: Red Road accident: Bus driver hid among injured
14 feared dead in truck accident in West Bengal's Jalpaiguri
sub_h: Fourteen people were feared dead and several others were injured when a boulder-laden truck overturned and fell on three small vehicles near Jaldhaka Bridge at Dhupguri in Jalpaiguri late on Tuesday.

h: 3 killed in motorcycle-truck collision in West Bengal
sub_h: Three persons were killed after the motorcycle they were travelling on collided with a truck in West Bengal's Nadia district on Monday, police said.

h: One killed, three injured in Road accident in Kolkata
sub_h: One person was killed and three others, including a policeman, were injured when a speeding four-wheeler hit them in the southern part of the city's Kasba area on Friday morning, police said. Four persons, including the driver of the BMW, were arrested, police said.

h: Three killed in Road accident in Kolkata
sub_h: Three people returning home in a mini-truck after cremating a close relative were killed in a Road accident on Jessore Road near Michaelnagar when the vehicle turned upside down possibly due to a burst tyre in the early hours Tuesday.

h: 4 killed, 4 injured in 5 Road accidents
One killed after speeding bus rams into bike in Kolkata
sub_h: A speeding private bus that had hit a biker from behind caught fire after the driver tried to speed away with the bike still trapped under the vehicle grazing against the ground as sparks came off in the process punctured the oil tank setting the bus on fire.

h: West Bengal: Senior police officer, 2 others killed in Road accident
sub_h: A senior officer of West Bengal Police and two others were killed when their car hit a stranded truck in Hooghly district on Friday.

h: Kolkata: One killed, another severely injured in two separate accidents
sub_h: A 47-year-old man was killed while another was severely injured in two separate accidents in Kolkata on Friday.

h: West Bengal: At least four killed, seven injured in Road accident in Burdwan
sub_h: In a tragic accident, a speeding truck mowed down as many as 11 people, killing at least four in the spot, in West Bengal's Burdwan district on Wednesday.

h: 12 picnickers injured in Road accident in West Bengal
sub_h: The incident happened at 7.30 am in Jinjira Bazar area.

h: Kolkata: Eight injured in Road accident
sub_h: At least eight persons, including six women were injured in a Road accident at Mayo road here on Sunday, police said.

h: Two killed, six injured in four accidents across Kolkata
sub_h: At least two persons were killed and six seriously injured in four different accidents across the city.

h: Kolkata: Four of Tollygunge family killed in Uttar Pradesh accident
sub_h: Four members of a family from Tollygunge were killed in a Road accident when their car collided with a trailer on Agra-Lucknow Expressway at Etawah in Uttar Pradesh in the wee hours of Thursday.

h: Kolkata: Three injured in separate Road accidents
sub_h: Three persons were injured in three separate accidents in the city on Sunday.

h: Kolkata: One killed, another hurt in 2 accidents
sub_h: A 60-year-old pedestrian was killed after being run over by an unidentified vehicle on Aurobindo Sarani around 10.55pm. Rajkumar Dutta, a resident of Nimu Goswami Lane, was taken to RG Kar Hospital where he was declared brought dead. Cops are checking CCTV footage to ascertain the driver’s identity.

h: Kolkata: Man dies in a Road accident
sub_h: One person died and another person was injured in two separate accidents in South Kolkata on Wednesday. The body was sent for post-mortem.

h: West Bengal man killed in truck accident
sub_h: A 33-year-old resident of West Midnapore’s Nayagram died after being hit by a truck on Chowbaga Road on Saturday. Cops took victim Subrata Sinha to a private nursing home near Ruby crossing, where he was declared brought dead. The truck driver drove away from the spot after the accident.

h: Kolkata: Five injured in Road accidents across city
Two bikers killed in late night accidents in Kolkata
